name: Pollution Solution
description:
Every day, about 23,457,129 tons of coal are burned to keep the global machine running. This consumption has many adverse secondary effects to both personal and global health, a harsh reality that some would rather keep a secret. Would you rather live without or maintain the status quo, no matter the cost? The only thing that is clear is that what we are doing now is unsustainable.

This project was created to test out a new art style and as a submission to the IndieCade2020 game jam. If you enjoy please leave a comment and tell your friends. As always, I am open to constructive criticism.
